document_title: Chronic ischemic heart disease: Causes and treatments
subsection_content:
Patients can completely prevent ischemic heart disease by properly controlling a group of modifiable risk factors. Detail:
Do not smoke, drink alcohol and use stimulants; Have a scientific diet: do not eat a lot of fat and cholesterol such as animal fat, fatty milk, eggs, milk, limit salty foods...; should eat a lot of fish, vegetables, fruits...; Maintain daily exercise, consult your doctor about the sport and exercise intensity appropriate to your physical condition.; Control weight, avoid overweight and obesity; Get reasonable rest, keep a happy spirit, avoid stress and prolonged stress.; Regular health check-ups to detect diseases early and promptly treat diseases, if any.
Reference: 12 foods that patients with myocardial ischemia should eat
Cardiovascular Center, Tam Anh General Hospital System brings together a team of leading doctors and cardiovascular experts in Vietnam; owns a modern machinery system such as a heart and coronary artery MSCT machine, an ECG machine to measure electrocardiogram and check heart rate, a Holter ECG machine and a 2-plane DSA coronary angiography system... to help with screening and early detection. and effectively treat cardiovascular diseases right from the early stages, saving time and treatment costs, improving the quality of life for patients.
